content: That's a great point about the tourism board's focus. I'll ask them about resources for artisans, but I'll also reach out to local community colleges, craft stores, and art organizations to find out about classes or workshops that can help me improve my craft-making skills. By the way, I've been meaning to restock my candle supplies, do you think the craft stores would also have information on local suppliers for materials like wax, essential oils, or fragrances?
